name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PolkaGate: The gateway to the Polkadot eco.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A user-friendly wallet for seamless browser-based interaction with Polkadot/Substrate-based blockchains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of the PolkaGate extensionâ€”a gateway to the Polkadot/Kusama ecosystem. Access a wide range of features, including:

    - Social account recovery
    - Manage identity
    - Pool and solo staking
    - View balances and transactions
    - Detect phishing sites
    - Export, import, and derive accounts
    - Governance participation
    - Ledger support
    - Parachain accounts
    - Proxy management
    - QR account import
    - Watch-only accounts
    - Light Client, and more

Experience the Polkadot world effortlessly with PolkaGate.

Follow us on Twitter: @polkagate
Questions? Join us on Matrix: #polkagate:matrix.org
